SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network

Interface VirtualGameController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualRMIGameController, VirtualSocketGameController
public interface VirtualGameController extends Remote
This interface contains the methods that can be called from the client in the game controller.

  • Method Details

    • choosePawnColor

      void choosePawnColor(String color, String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Sets the pawn color
      Parameters:
      color - chosen color index
      playerID - ID of the player who is choosing the color
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if remote object cannot be called

    • selectSecretMission

      void selectSecretMission(int cardIndex, String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Selects the chosen secret mission card
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - index of the selected mission card
      playerID - ID of the player who is selecting the secret mission card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • setSecretMission

      void setSecretMission(String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Sets the selected secret mission card on the personal board of the player
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who is setting the secret mission card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • selectCardFromHand

      void selectCardFromHand(int cardIndex, String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Selects the chosen card in the hand
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - index of the card in the player's hand
      playerID - ID of the player who is selected the card to play
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • turnSelectedCardSide

      void turnSelectedCardSide(String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Turns the side of the selected card
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who is turning the side of the selected card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • selectPositionOnBoard

      void selectPositionOnBoard(int selectedX, int selectedY, String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Selects a position on the personal board where the player wants to place the selected card
      Parameters:
      selectedX - coordinate on the X axis of the chosen position on the personal board
      selectedY - coordinate on the Y axis of the chosen position on the personal board
      playerID - ID of the player who is selecting the position on the personal board
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • playCardFromHand

      void playCardFromHand(String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Places the selected side on the personal board
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who is playing the selected side of the card in the hand
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • selectCardFromCommonTable

      void selectCardFromCommonTable(int cardIndex, String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Selects the card on the common table that the currentPlayer wants to draw
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - index of the card on the common table
      playerID - ID of the player who is trying to select the card on the common table
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • drawSelectedCard

      void drawSelectedCard(String playerID) throws RemoteException
      Draw a card from the common table and places it on the current player's hand
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who is trying to draw the selected card on the common table
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • addMessage

      void addMessage(String message, String receiverNickname, String senderID, String time) throws RemoteException
      Add a new message into the chat
      Parameters:
      message - body of the message
      receiverNickname - nickname of the receiver player
      senderID - ID of the sender player
      time - local time of the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called

    • reAddView

      void reAddView(VirtualView view, String clientID) throws RemoteException
      Readds the virtual view after the server has gone down, because the connection must be recreated
      Parameters:
      view - client's view
      clientID - client's original ID
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote object cannot be called
